short.en_US:
************** Third Upgrades Mod **************
                 ****************** version: v2.13.1 ********************
                 *********** VMaiko's Typhon Edition ***********
                 ******************Scripting by PerryR, Berserker****************

Adds a third upgrade for every creature! Uses the Typhon Mod.
Enables all creature specialists to also specialize in the third upgrade. This mod disables WoG Script "39 wog - hero specialization boost".
